review: Doctor was very friendly and was taking good care. I've been in the hospital for 3 days and all these days doctor was visiting in the night,  spent some time explaining the course of medicine taken, daily improvement, about discharge etc. Overall I'm 100% satisfied with the treatment given by this doctor and the hospital staffs.

My wife had met the doctor and it was for general consultation. ********* *** **** ** *** ******. I am satisfied with the treatment given. I can definitely recommend doctor to my family or friends. I was happy and even my mother visited. Medicines worked. COVID protocol was followed. Hospitality was good. Social distance was maintained to an extent. Doctor was listening to health issues.

Bad hospital *** ****** *********** ****** *** ****** * for high bp and sugar they kept patient in ICU.  ****** ****** ***** ******* ***** ** *** ****** I had very bad experience always not for the first time, this was my third visit. **** ** *********** *****
